subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games (2012)
Triathlon
lead_paragraph: Lukas Verzbicass is the 2011 junior world champion, but an injury prevented him from qualifying for the 2012 United States Olympic team.
snippet: Lukas Verzbicass is the 2011 junior world champion, but an injury prevented him from qualifying for the 2012 United States Olympic team.
